name: Bitrise
headline: Hosted Continuous Integration and Delivery for mobile apps
description: Bitrise helps you automate your daily app development tasks from building through testing to deployment. With Bitrise you can configure these tasks with a unique, visual workflow editor, with dozens of service integrations ready to roll. We call these steps, and they are all open source! If the step you need is not in our collection you can create your own and share it with others. Project Managers can get a clear picture of the development and testing of apps, testers get regular notifications about available, testable builds, and clients are able to collaborate with the rest of the team. Bitrise is free to get started and takes just 50 seconds to setup your first project.

## Customize Bitrise to fit your needs
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5db35de024bb983af1b4e151/64a70c27f57ed7a06c6d42a4_cpu.png)Scalable infrastructure optimized for performance →Use as many as 80 VMs at once with the option of dependency caching.](https://bitrise.io/<https:/bitrise.io/why/features/mobile-build-caching-for-better-build-test-performance>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5db35de024bb983af1b4e151/64b1a483155380f728590068_webhooks.png)Automated builds and validated code changes →Set up webhooks for code events, such as code push, Git Tag, or PRs.](https://bitrise.io/</solutions/use-cases/continuous-integration>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5db35de024bb983af1b4e151/64b1a51e84409276136cac78_terminal.png)Build flexibility with custom script support →Run scripts in Bash, Go, Ruby, JavaScript, and many more with the Script step.](https://bitrise.io/<https:/bitrise.io/integrations/steps>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5db35de024bb983af1b4e151/650342a47fd2ab6557973957_build-speeds.svg)
## **Best-in-class build speeds**
Utilize Bitrise's top-tier build machines and Bitrise Build Cache for speeds up to 20x faster than conventional CI workflows. With build workers and remote cache co-located within the same network, Bitrise virtually eliminates latency, ensuring streamlined access to cached data and consequently resulting in accelerated build speeds.
[Build machines](https://bitrise.io/</platform/devops/build-platform/virtualized-m1-environment>)
## **Automated Code Signing**
Connecting your Apple Developer Portal account to Bitrise will make you forget about manually updating your code signing files. We will manage the rest during build time and make sure that archiving and deployment is happening without any issues.
[Code signing documentation](https://bitrise.io/<https:/devcenter.bitrise.io/en/code-signing.html>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5db35de024bb983af1b4e151/64b57fe952aabd59fcbe5d02_code-signing.svg)
### Masters of Efficiency
## 50+ recipes to accelerate your CI/CD workflows
[Download report →](https://bitrise.io/<https:/yo.bitrise.io/bitrise-workflow-recipes-download.html>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5db35de024bb983af1b4e151/65fd743998b826db9e7857ec_2056_cookbook_lp_image.webp)](https://bitrise.io/<https:/yo.bitrise.io/bitrise-workflow-recipes-download.html>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5db35de024bb983af1b4e151/64b581a1028d8b372bac797e_private-environments.svg)
## **Customizable private or dedicated environments**
Choose our Dedicated Build Platform for exclusive access to secure machines dedicated solely to your use, or opt for the Private Build Platform, offering custom configuration with a secure firewall and computing setup, enhanced by a site-to-site VPN.
[Dedicated environments](https://bitrise.io/</platform/devops/build-platform/enterprise>)
## **Bitrise Build Cache**
Accelerate build and test times with the Bitrise Build Cache. Our solution supports caching with Gradle and Bazel. By intelligently storing and reusing build and test results, you eliminate the need to start from scratch, reducing time to market, improving DevX, and optimizing CI/CD costs.
[Mobile build caching](https://bitrise.io/</platform/devops/build-caching>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5db35de024bb983af1b4e151/654ac00b91ee4d5f4ba8c5a9_build-cache.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5db35de024bb983af1b4e151/64c916a2f8cb949890bce6ff_xcode-versions.svg)
## **Xcode versions/betas available within 24 hours post-release**
Access continuously refreshed VM images for all common mobile development use cases, and seamlessly transitioned with retained older versions. With new tool updates like Xcode delivered within 24 hours of release, you're equipped with the latest technology for your builds.
## **Bitrise Insights**
Steer clear of unwelcome surprises when building your mobile app. Get the data you need, when you need it, to pinpoint flaky tests and breaking builds earlier. Our CI/CD monitoring dashboard provides actionable insights, including build, test, build cache, and credit data. This empowers you to enhance efficiency by illuminating the root of your challenges, effectively unblocking your development pathway.
[Bitrise Insights](https://bitrise.io/</platform/devops/insights>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5db35de024bb983af1b4e151/65034396cf49fdfd4bf0d772_insights.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5db35de024bb983af1b4e151/64b581ec0676e2b53280783e_mobile-testing.svg)
## **Mobile-specific testing**
Unlike standard CI/CD web solutions, we are focussed on being mobile specific, which includes supporting your mobile-specific testing needs. Tests include UI, snapshot, screenshot testing and more.
[Mobile testing](https://bitrise.io/</platform/devops/mobile-test-reporting>)
## **Mobile-app-developer-first focus**
The only CI/CD platform that specializes in mobile development, providing tailored solutions, integrations, and a streamlined workflow that's optimized for mobile app developers.
[Mobile DevOps](https://bitrise.io/</solutions/use-cases/mobile-devops>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5db35de024bb983af1b4e151/64b581fab1074ebe5ed7a587_mobile-first.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5db35de024bb983af1b4e151/64b58241d5767496744b807f_release-management.svg)
## **Automated Release Management**
Automate tedious release management tasks, gain transparency across all release processes, and enjoy a single control center for both iOS and Android releases.
[Release managment](https://bitrise.io/</platform/devops/release-management-old>)

## **Best-in-class build speeds**
Utilize Bitrise's top-tier build machines and Bitrise Build Cache for speeds up to 20x faster than conventional CI workflows. With build workers and remote cache co-located within the same network, Bitrise virtually eliminates latency, ensuring streamlined access to cached data and consequently resulting in accelerated build speeds.
Build machines⟨79⟩
## **Automated Code Signing**
Connecting your Apple Developer Portal account to Bitrise will make you forget about manually updating your code signing files. We will manage the rest during build time and make sure that archiving and deployment is happening without any issues.

## **Customizable private or dedicated environments**
Choose our Dedicated Build Platform for exclusive access to secure machines dedicated solely to your use, or opt for the Private Build Platform, offering custom configuration with a secure firewall and computing setup, enhanced by a site-to-site VPN.

## **Bitrise Build Cache**
Accelerate build and test times with the Bitrise Build Cache. Our solution supports caching with Gradle and Bazel. By intelligently storing and reusing build and test results, you eliminate the need to start from scratch, reducing time to market, improving DevX, and optimizing CI/CD costs.

## **Xcode versions/betas available within 24 hours post-release**
Access continuously refreshed VM images for all common mobile development use cases, and seamlessly transitioned with retained older versions. With new tool updates like Xcode delivered within 24 hours of release, you're equipped with the latest technology for your builds.
## **Bitrise Insights**
Steer clear of unwelcome surprises when building your mobile app. Get the data you need, when you need it, to pinpoint flaky tests and breaking builds earlier. Our CI/CD monitoring dashboard provides actionable insights, including build, test, build cache, and credit data. This empowers you to enhance efficiency by illuminating the root of your challenges, effectively unblocking your development pathway.

generated_description:
### Bitrise: Your Go-To Mobile CI/CD Platform

Founded in 2014 and hailing from Budapest, Hungary, Bitrise is shaking up the mobile development world. As a part of Y Combinator’s Batch W17, Bitrise’s mission is simple yet profound: to provide *Hosted Continuous Integration and Delivery* specifically for mobile apps. 

#### What Does Bitrise Do?

At its core, Bitrise automates the repetitive tasks developers face daily—from building and testing to deploying mobile applications. This isn’t just automation for the sake of it; Bitrise provides a unique visual workflow editor where you can create tailored integrations with a plethora of services, often leveraging open-source steps. If you need something specific that isn’t readily available, you have the freedom to create and share your own steps.

#### Who Benefits?

- **Project Managers** get clarity on app development and testing processes.
- **Testers** receive timely notifications about builds ready for testing.
- **Clients** benefit from seamless collaboration with development teams.

With an impressive setup time of just 50 seconds to start your first project, Bitrise is designed to be user-friendly and accessible, making it easy for teams to hit the ground running. 

#### Key Features

- **Build & Test Caching**: Dramatically reduces build time by over 75%.
- **Release Management**: Automates deployments for iOS apps, streamlining the release process.
- **Mobile DevOps**: Ensures that development teams can release confidently and quickly.

Bitrise also offers robust insights to track build performance, helping teams identify bottlenecks and optimize workflows. With integrations for major mobile platforms—including iOS, Android, Flutter, and React Native—Bitrise caters to a diverse range of use cases.

#### Why Bitrise?

The platform is not just about speed; it’s about reliability. With Bitrise, the promise is that you’ll be first to market with the latest stable Xcode stacks. Plus, developers love it: the platform has facilitated a 95% increase in build success and substantial decreases in testing time. 

The team, which has grown to 243 people, is led by notable figures like Jared Friedman, ensuring strong guidance and visionary leadership. At its heart, Bitrise exemplifies how specialized CI/CD solutions can transform mobile development into a more efficient and productive endeavor.

#### Getting Started

Curious about how Bitrise can enhance your app development workflow? You can start for free and explore all of the powerful features it offers. Check them out [here](https://bitrise.io) and discover how Bitrise can cut down your build times and catapult your mobile apps to success!
